mapper.insert: insert into Resource (`code`, parentCode, `name`, url, sort, type, menuShow, availableStatus, createTime) values (#{code}, #{parentCode}, #{name}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{menuShow}, #{availableStatus}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update Resource
`name` = #{name},
url = #{url},
sort = #{sort},
type = #{type},
menuShow = #{menuShow},
availableStatus = #{availableStatus},
updateTime = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id, `code`, parentCode, `name`, sort, type, menuShow, availableStatus from Resource
(`code` like concat(#{key},'%') or parentCode like concat(#{key},'%') or `name` like concat(#{key},'%')) and
type = #{type} and
menuShow = #{menuShow} and
availableStatus = #{availableStatus} and
order by
${item.columnName} ${item.sortType},
id desc,

select r.`code`, r.parentCode, r.`name`, r.url, r.type, r.sort from Resource r
right join (select distinct rr.resourceCode from RoleResource rr right join AdminRole ar on ar.roleCode = rr.roleCode where ar.adminId = #{selfId} ) t on t.resourceCode = r.code
r.availableStatus = #{availableStatus} and
r.type in
#{item}
and
r.menuShow = #{menuShow} and
order by r.`sort` desc, r.id
select id, `code`, parentCode, `name`, url, sort, type, menuShow, createTime, updateTime, availableStatus from Resource where `code` = #{code} for update
